meanings.definition: In a way that relates to the use of cosmetics or beauty products.
meanings.sent1: She applied the makeup cosmetically before the party.
meanings.sent2: The skincare products worked cosmetically to enhance her features.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would cosmetically enhance his appearance with a clown wig.
meanings.sent4: The paint cosmetically covered the imperfections on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden were arranged cosmetically to create a beautiful display.

meanings.definition: In a way that improves appearance without changing the structure or function.
meanings.sent1: The new curtains cosmetically changed the look of the room.
meanings.sent2: The dentist cosmetically fixed her smile with teeth whitening.
meanings.sent3: The cat cosmetically rearranged the pillows on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The lighting cosmetically transformed the atmosphere of the restaurant.
meanings.sent5: The artist cosmetically altered the painting to make it more appealing.
